message: Hello Bob, I have a product that I think would be quite valuable to you. I'm offering it to you for $110. This is a fair price considering the market value of this product. Would you be interested in purchasing it at this price?
Thanks for your offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but $110 is a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it for $90?

Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest in the product. While I understand budget constraints, $90 is lower than what I can accept for this item. I've considered your offer and I'm willing to come down to $105. This is a high-quality product that would normally retail for much more, so I believe this is a fair compromise.
Thanks for coming down to $105, Alice. I really appreciate it, but I'm still trying to stick to a tighter budget. Could you possibly go any lower? How about $95?
